channel.title: Requirments To teleport? Please help
channel.description: Okay i Added a Portal for GWD but how can i make it require a Killcount? Please help me

item.title: Requirments To teleport? Please help
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

Rocky2k10:

Okay i Added a Portal for GWD but how can i make it require a Killcount? Please help me

Very long way to explain.
Short : look in the character file and if u see this “character-saradomin” then u just need to make : if(objectID == xxxx){ if(saraKills > 19){ toX = 2740; toY = 5074; saraKills -= 19; sM("The Saradomin kills drain from you.."); } else sM("You need at least 20 Saradomin kills to get in the cave."); }

Change the xxxx to your portal id and the toX and toY also to your coords.
This is basic on delta servers so i hope it works for u.

Let me know.

Read full topic
